alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 11:43PM CDT until June 18 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Eastern Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1142 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Elgin to 5 miles northwest of Quay, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Pawnee... Skiatook... Hominy... Cleveland... Fairfax... Barnsdall... Shidler... Wynona... Ralston... Avant... Osage... Hallett... Blackburn... Maramec... Skedee... Foraker... Bigheart... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
